code:
import{$host,$authHost}from'./index';// для гостей и авторизованных пользователей
export const createExhibition=async exhibition=>{const{data}=await $authHost.post('exhibition',exhibition);return data;};// полчение выставок
export const fetchExhibitions=async function(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let limit=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:9;const{data}=await $host.get('exhibition',{params:{page,limit}});return data;};// получение олной выставки
export const fetchOneExhibition=async id=>{const{data}=await $host.get("exhibition/".concat(id));return data;};// обновление выставки по id
export const updateExhibition=async(id,exhibition)=>{const{data}=await $authHost.put("exhibition/".concat(id),exhibition);return data;};// удаляет выставки по id
export const deleteExhibition=async id=>{const{data}=await $authHost.delete("exhibition/".concat(id));return data;};
